projects.name: The Economist
projects.subtitle: Visual Journalism Platform
projects.description: Led the Visual Journalism Team transformation with next-generation tools and frameworks. Architected scalable data visualization solutions that increased story engagement across 50+ million global readers.

projects.name: Toyota
projects.subtitle: Legacy System Migration
projects.description: Re-platformed 8 legacy systems onto modern web stack. Led distributed teams across 3 time zones through complex technical migrations while maintaining 100% uptime and achieving 60% performance improvement.

projects.name: Guardian
projects.subtitle: Mobile Authentication
projects.description: Delivered Apple Sign In for React Native applications. Enhanced mobile experience for 5+ million readers worldwide, increasing mobile auth conversion rates by 25%.

projects.name: British Gas
projects.subtitle: Next-Gen Mobile App
projects.description: Built next-generation mobile app as part of core team. Won multiple internal awards for engineering excellence and SOLID principles implementation.

projects.name: Indee Softworks
projects.subtitle: Software Consultancy
projects.description: Co-founded and built something special from the ground up. Led development of multiple client projects and built an engineering team.

projects.name: Shell
projects.subtitle: Digital R&D Projects
projects.description: Worked on digital R&D projects including Node services and React Native apps. Delivered innovative solutions for energy sector challenges.

testimonials.quote: He is able to articulate highly technical subject matter effectively across all stakeholders. Very approachable and down to earth which made it easy for our design function to work well with engineering.
testimonials.author: Rishi Michael Arch
testimonials.title: Senior Product Designer

testimonials.quote: Jonjoe is one of the nicest, most dedicated and innovative people I have ever worked with. Always looking to push the boundaries of possibility and with sound logic always delivers to a really high standard.
testimonials.author: Andrew Machin
testimonials.title: Managing Director @ Kounter

testimonials.quote: In an increasingly corporate world Jonjoe is a blast of fresh air. You will learn more from overhearing a conversation with Jonjoe than from many more formal training resources.
testimonials.author: Mick Stevens
testimonials.title: Systems Engineer @ BAE Systems
